name: Lick
description: You reach out and lick a target. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, do 1d6 + MOVE ghost damage. On a natural attack roll of 18 or higher, the target becomes paralyzed.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.

contest.effect: Startles the last Pok√©mon to act before the user.
